statements.select:
select t1.gportno,t1.equipment_name,t1.port_name, CASE t1.needcharge WHEN 1 THEN '欠' WHEN 0 THEN '不欠' END AS NEEDCHARGE, CASE t1.slms_flag WHEN 0 THEN '复位' WHEN 1 THEN '新增' WHEN 2 THEN '修改' WHEN 3 THEN '删除' END AS slms_flag from View_Eqp_Out_Port t1
T1.GPORTNO LIKE '%'||#where.GPORTNO#||'%'
T1.EQUIPMENT_NAME LIKE '%'||#where.EQUIPMENT_NAME#||'%'
T1.PORT_NAME LIKE '%'||#where.PORT_NAME#||'%'
ORDER BY t1.equipment_name,t1.port_name

select t1.* from View_Eqp_Out_Port t1
T1.GPORTNO = #where.GPORTNO#
